Title: Metro Carousel for nopCommerce
Description: Metro Carousel for nopCommerce is a Metro (Windows 8) Themed carousel/slider that features on the Home Page and holds up to 5 slides/pictures.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Metro Carousel for nopCommerce is a Metro (Windows 8) Themed carousel/slider that features on the Home Page and holds up to 5 slides/pictures.

Notable features:

- Metro (Windows 8) Themed / Styled
- Advanced configuration settings
- Supports up to 5 slides
- Each slide can be hyperlinked
- Made for Metro UI Theme for nopCommerce 3.30 but will work with any.

Additional information on the project is available here: Project Information.
